description: It's no secret that we love a good wine cocktail. And while&nbsp;sangria is always a go-to, sometimes you need something refreshing and new to mix things up!This mango wine cocktail has all of the ingredients your taste buds are craving this season—fruity flavors from fresh mangoes, tartness from&nbsp;white wine, and sweetness from the&nbsp;maple syrup, along with the blend of&nbsp;vodka and lime. Plus, it's super easy to mix up!
name: Mango Passion
